topic.title: Languages
topic.section: This system can support multi-lingual presses, as well as presses in languages other than English. Those languages that have been made available for the system by the Site Administrator are listed under Languages in Press Management, and can in turn be selected for use with the press site. If more than one language is selected under Supported Locales, visitors to the site will be able to toggle between languages via a drop-down menu in the navigation bar. Additionally, users will be able to enter form information in any enabled language.
